vote.title: Authorize a First Amendment to the Ground Lease Agreement with Martha Morguloff and Danna Morguloff-Hayden to extend the lease agreement for an additional eighteen months for approximately 17,150 square feet of unimproved land located at 5807 Royal Lane, to be used as a temporary location for Fire Station Number 41 for the period August 1, 2022 through January 31, 2024 - Not to exceed $27,000.00 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a First Amendment to the Ground Lease Agreement with Martha Morguloff and Danna Morguloff-Hayden to extend the lease agreement for an additional eighteen months for approximately 17,150 square feet of unimproved land located at 5807 Royal Lane, to be used as a temporary location for Fire Station Number 41 for the period August 1, 2022 through January 31, 2024 - Not to exceed $27,000.00 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
